data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Halland, Sweden so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Halland, Sweden
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Halland, Sweden need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary: On average, 30 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Halland, Sweden.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Halland do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Halland that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Turk people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, guide seekers in Halland, Sweden to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 17,473 believers in Halland and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary:
the state of Halland, Sweden has a population of 304,100.

We estimate Halland has 17,473 people who might know Jesus, 152,412 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 134,216 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 17 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Halland, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.
